page.title: 17PENICUIK YM/YWCA
page.content: { YM/YWCA (young men/women's christian {association) Penicuik YMCA was started 14 years ago in an old building which was once the school for the old village of Kirkhill.It was{officially opened by {Princess Alexandra in 1973.}Some years later a large modern building was added.It provides a{sports hall, {squash sports,a coffee bar and {lounge.}Now the YMCA in Penicuik has {1300 members}.800 are young people. It costs Â£8.50 a year for adults over 18 years old, Â£5.50 for 14-18 year olds,Â£1.75 for 7-14 year olds and Â£1.20 for Old Age Pensioners. When our reporters went to the YM they saw the {sauna, the sunbed and the Multi-gym which cost Â£3000 and can be used by nine people. The YM also owns{2 tennis {courts and a bowling green.
